bibl.title: John McKinnon vs. The United States. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Circuit Court of the United States 9th Judicial Circuit

div1.ab: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES 9th. JUDICIAL DISTRICT, DISTRICT of WASHINGTON, Northern WESTERN DIVISION.
In the Matter of the Application of John McKinnon for A Writ of Habeas Corpus.
div1.p: Upon the petition and affidavit filed in behalf of John McKinnon for a writ of habeas corpus, it is hereby orderd by the Court that the United States Marshal for the District of Washington appear and show cause before this Court upon the incoming of court on Monday January 25th. 1897- why the writ of habeas corpus should not issue as prayed for by the petitioner and show cause to this Court his reasons for the detention of said petitioner, and it further appearing to the Court that the said John McKinnon has not sufficient means with which to prosects this proceeding - It is hereby ordered that he be allowed to do so in forma pauperis.
Done in open Court this 12th day of January, 1897.
div1.ab: In the United States Circuit Court FOR THE DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In the Matter of the Application of John McKinnon for A Writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed Jan. 15 1897 -IN THE- U.S. CIRCUIT COURT A. Reeves Ayres CLERK
